body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Jonathan Robinson and the customer's name is Patricia Morris.  The conversation is about a random business (a Pawn Shop ) and is a conversation about privacy.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! My name is Jonathan Robinson, and I'm with Gold Star Pawn Shop. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Jonathan, I'm Patricia Morris. I had some questions about your privacy policies.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: It's great to meet you, Patricia! We take your privacy very seriously at Gold Star Pawn Shop. What specific information are you concerned about?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I want to know how safe my personal information is with you.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Absolutely, I can explain that. Before we dive in, could you please confirm your email address for us?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you! And just one more thing, could you provide me with your phone number, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, it's five five five, one two three, four five six seven.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Patricia! Your information will be kept confidential and used only for necessary communications.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: That makes me feel better. Thank you for clearing that up!

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're very welcome! Thank you for your time today, Patricia. If you have any more questions, feel free to reach out. Have a great day!
